site_name: Chambers Court Heathstan RoadLondonW12 0SJ
borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
description: Car park. T10) Large Acacia, reduce crown height and lateral branches by 2m, pruning back to suitable growth points, leaving shortened selected secondary growth to form a smaller neater symmetrical shaped canopy. T2) Medium Catalpa, reduce crown height and lateral branches by 2m, pruning back to suitable growth points, leaving shortened selected secondary growth to form a smaller neater symmetrical shaped canopy. T3) Medium Prunus, cut back from car port by 2m. T4) Medium Acer, reduce crown height and lateral branches by 2m, pruning back to suitable growth points, leaving shortened selected secondary growth to form a smaller neater symmetrical shaped canopy. Rear of Chambers Court. T6, T7, T8)  3 x Large Acacias, reduce crown height by 2m, reduce lateral branches by 1.5-2m, pruning back to suitable growth points, leaving shortened selected secondary growth to form a smaller neater symmetrical shaped canopy. T9, T10, T11, T12) 4 x Medium Prunus (recently reduced), lift and cut back from street light to give a 2m clearance.T13, T14, T15) 3 x Medium Acacias, reduce crown height by 2m, reduce lateral branches by 1.5-2m, pruning back to suitable growth points, leaving shortened selected secondary growth to form a smaller neater symmetrical shaped canopy.
